node.title: HI this is me tanisha
node.content:
Hey guys! I’ve working with WP + Gatsby for a while and I am currently building Apollo on top of that and I need wp-graphql in order to use the Apollo queries. However, I ran in an interesting issue.

GraphiQL only show me endpoints of the rest end and wp-graphql is completely ignored. For example I can find the allWordpressPost, while I am actually looking for the the post field with it’s list.
